name: Taylor Gibbs
description: Originally part of a nomad family, he betrayed his clan to theRaffen ShivatTipton Peakresulting in the former's slaughter, By2077. he is a resident ofDogtownwho joined Jacob Long in trying to steal anairdropfromBARGHEST, despite having a bad feeling about it.While going up the abandoned hotel with Long onElizabeth Kressstreet to get a good vantage point, Long and Gibbs unknowingly stumble uponVand PresidentRosalind Myershiding out in theKress Street Hideout.
